author: Stephen McLean
comment: I would like to see MORE customization for $2.50. Background photo. Tap to launch fitness app, step & other insights. It's a great start but let's keep going, please

reply.author: DeNitE Appz
reply.content: This can be done with third party complications.

author: Nelson Pacheco
comment: I like the look, but the steps done match the Google Fit steps. Besides that I don't have any complaints.

reply.author: DeNitE Appz
reply.content: Please review the Trouble Shooting or email me for help resolving.

author: ira jackson
comment: This watch face fits my needs but what i would really like to rate is the customer service i received i was having a problem and they took the time to walk me through the settings the problem was 100% me not the app so thank you for the time you spent
